items.summary: CRITICAL: Potential SQL Injection Attempt on /api/v1/apply/credit
items.description: WAF triggered on payload containing 'UNION SELECT' and '--'. Source IP: 192.168.44.11. Request bypassed initial validation layer. Immediate sanitization review required for the 'AccountHolderName' field.

items.summary: Exposed Internal Database Schema in Error Response
items.description: A failed query on the 'Payments' table leaked DB structure in the verbose error message (Status 500). Needs immediate silencing of production stack traces. Correlates with PAY-101 latency issues.
